participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and ambitious, Alex has a passion for animation and values friendships.
participant_1.background: My family and I have different goals, but we get along well. I live in a city where I can always find a basketball court. I have a girlfriend named Luis, and she goes to my college. I work in TV. Someday I wish to become a famous animator and work for a big company like Dreamworks.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and imaginative, Maya enjoys exploring her interests and expressing her nerdy side.
participant_2.background: I love sushi because it reminds me of the ocean, where my beta fish lives. I'm too short to reach the top shelf. My favorite drink is iced coffee. I recently got to dress up and explore my nerdy side at Comic Con. Someday I would like a truck.

content.text: Hey! My day is going great!  how's yours?
Its going pretty well! What did you do today?
I went to Comic Con! It was amazing!
That sounds like a lot of fun! What was your favorite part?
I got to dress up as a character from my favorite TV show!
That sounds awesome! What TV show?
It's called Steven Universe! Have you heard of it?
No, I haven't actually! What's it about?
Oh man, its so good! Its about these magical gems that protect earth from evil.
That sounds really cool! I'll have to check it out sometime.
You totally should! It's the best!
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, watch movies, and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do all of those things too!
Cool! We should hang out sometime!
